description: Yam Lal Kandel is a Nepalese politician from the CPN (UML) party who assumed office as the 4th Chief Minister of Karnali Province on April 10, 2024. His political history includes serving as a Member of the Karnali Provincial Assembly (2018–present), a Member of the Parliament's Pratinidhi Sabha (1994–1998), Minister of Tourism and Civil Aviation (1998), and Leader of the Opposition in the Karnali Provincial Assembly for two terms (2021–2022 and 2023–2024).
short_description: Nepalese politician serving as the 4th and current Chief Minister of Karnali Province since April 2024.
